citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50am-11:20am
on 10/03/2024. On 10/03/2024 at 9:52am eastern time, while the inspection team were in route to inspect the facility, the
inspector received a text communication from the licensee referencing their availability for the week. According to the text
message, the licensee indicated that they will not be available for the rest of the week. However, the notice was
insufficient in timing as the inspection team were already in route when the text communication was received.
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking at door of the facility and calling at the phone number in the
account. When called the facility representative said that no representative could be available for the inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Robert Ferguson, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50am-11:20am 
on 10/03/2024. On 10/03/2024 at 9:52am eastern time, while the inspection team were in route to inspect the facility, the 
inspector received a text communication from the licensee referencing their availability for the week. According to the text 
message, the licensee indicated that they will not be available for the rest of the week. However, the notice was 
insufficient in timing as the inspection team were already in route when the text communication was received.  
 
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking at door of the facility and calling at the phone number in the 
account. When called the facility representative said that no representative could be available for the inspection.  
 Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Robert Ferguson, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
